Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
27.12.2011 GB SCR16990 Extended list of parameters if the BCM002 is calls
16.05.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
20.08.2010 GB SCR15751 Extended condition for selection in thePart4
04.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
28.07.2008 SH SCR13830 Part1/Step2 Changed calc of v.DIFFERENCE
23.04.2008 SH SCR13566 Added BCM002.PI.VALUEDATE = null
15.10.2007 SH SCR12974 Part1: Uses now client language for MlsTrans()
07.03.2007 SH SCR12353 Part2: Changed stock updates (done now by BAD724)
01.08.2007 SH SCR12216 Part4: Changed BMQ001.PI.MQDT_INVO_NO = LCHI_LCHD_NO to be now = LCHI_NO.
21.12.2006 SH SCR12188 Part4: Changed selection of LCHI to populate MQ159
18.12.2006 SH SCR12181 Part2 Fixed bug with test on LCHI_DATEEXPIRYTRANSIT
24.11.2006 SH SCR12118 Part1/Step2: Changed selection of LCHI to calc v.HIGHESTLCAMOUNT; Part 6: Extended test on LCHI
14.11.2006 SH SCR12095 Part2 Extended updates of LCHD acc. to transit fields
27.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Part 6 Extended selection with LCHD_CDEP_NO > 0
19.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changes acc. to "LC remarks 20" --> Added Part 6 and changed part 4
18.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changes acc. to "LC remarks 19"
@Part 1-6 are handled in single transactions
... variable uses to call BCM002 in T.S. after DB updates of CDEP
-- finally perform updates in other tables if CDEP was upadted/created, so if
a difference was calculated
-- Perfomr CDEP updates if a difference exists
.. update current CDEP row if exists
-- uses to call BCM002 in T.S., after final CDEP DB storage
... else create a new CDEP row
-- Reset variable
-- Calc sum

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(LCHI_AMOUNTLC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCHI where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE < 10 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Get max. CDEP_DEPNO
-- uses to call BCM002 in parent task, after final CDEP DB storage
-- Call BAD724 to perform stock updates
-- Store new LCHI row
-- Clear MQ 152
-- Populate MQ152 (No ING reply on opening)
-- Clear MQ 159
-- Populate MQ159 (Outstanding releases)
-- Clear MQ 157
-- Populate MQ157 (Expired LC's)
-- Further steps have to be only performed if there no LCHI row exists where
LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 20 and LCHI is not released (OK or not OK)
-- Reset variables
-- Test when the last dunning letter was sent
-- Send a letter (L91) to the client
